data.name: The Cyclist: Tactics Demo
data.detailed_description:
The Cyclist: Tactics is a turn-based pro-cycling tactics and strategy game in which you lead a small team of riders from humble beginnings to topping the podium of a grand tour.

Demo Version Content

There is a free demo version of The Cyclist: Tactics which offers the following features.

    [*[b]]Learn:[/b] See how the game works in all eight included tutorial missions
  • Race: Take on a flat, a hilly, and a mountain classic - all fully procedurally generated
  • Strategize: Compete in a full, seven-stage tour, in flat and hilly terrain
  • Adapt: Customize your riders' levels, specializations, and attributes

Note that this demo version is based on the current alpha version of the full game. It is considered a work in progress and does not represent the quality of the finished product.

The Game World

Race in a fictional world through a range of procedurally generated tours and classics, each individually themed to ensure that every session is unique and different. Featuring changeable weather, an original, multi-layered soundtrack that adjusts to the current race situation, and a board-game-like aesthetic, The Cyclist: Tactics provides an engaging visual and audio experience as you put your tactical skills to the test.

Race Tactics & Resource Management

Guide a team of up to four riders through multi-day tours and gruelling classics. Use your riders’ strengths to your advantage while utilizing team strategy to offset their weaknesses. Slipstream and positioning are vitally important, as is the varied terrain with flats, hills, mountains, tricky technical, and cobble sections that influence rider performance. There is no dice rolling in The Cyclist: Tactics to either save you or screw you over; you have just your decision making to blame.

data.short_description: A pro cycling turn-based tactics and strategy game. Create your own rider and manage your team throughout career mode, or compete in customizable single races and tours. Manage your resources wisely and outsmart the competition to ride to the top.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or equivalent
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 or equivalent
  • Graphics: GeForce 1050
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
